name: 0A0X Nightmask
flavor: Crucible variant. Cut down and regraphed for agility.

name: Acolyte Rung
flavor: "Mota was so close -- clawing her way out with bones torn from the Acolytes. Her fall -- Omnigul. You honor her." - Eris

name: AOS#Cryptid
flavor: Crucible variant. Activated polymer will self-shape to grip your favorite knife.

name: Argus Deimatic
flavor: The coil complex on the left gauntlet may experience alarming mass fluctuations.

name: Aspriet
flavor: Crucible variant. Fieldweave grafted for strong, accurate throws.

name: Astrolord Grips
flavor: Accept war as a fundamental process, not a transient condition.

name: Battuta
flavor: Some of the City's best-selling authors are Hunters-turned-travel writers.

name: Blindsight Sleeves
flavor: "With the sight, I saw the self within the self." —Fractal Scrolls

name: Bog Wild
flavor: Try not to get bogged down with the little things.

name: Brusilov
flavor: One part curiosity, one part obligation, two parts reckless pride.

name: Carnivore Match
flavor: It's all in the execution.

name: Cold Mantis
flavor: "Your job on the fireteam is to answer the question 'Can we kill that thing?' Make sure the answer is always yes."

name: Corsair's Revenge
flavor: "During the Hildian Campaign, modified Fallen armor was more common among the Reef troops than the standard issue."

name: Cryptid
flavor: The lovingly crafted Cryptid family includes a kinematically charged joint massager - on every finger!

name: Darkhollow Grasps
flavor: "All the vastness of our universe is but a blank page on which they scrawl their words of hate and death." —Eris Morn

name: Dead Light Grips
flavor: "At least we'll know we tried." —Arach Henri

name: Desolate Grips
flavor: More than shadows, but less than starstuff.

name: Dogged Gage
flavor: One doesn't need sleeves to keep knives inside them.

name: Don't Touch Me
flavor: Amputated from a creature that stumbled out of a Vex gate. A vestigial defensive reflex still remains.

name: Dustwalker
flavor: Shiftwire can induce nerve activity. It makes mere skin feel like dead plastic.

name: Elector's Grips
flavor: True power comes from the hands of the people.

name: Exodus Grips
flavor: We must make our own safety without the City.

name: Fear Eater
flavor: Stay at the top of the food chain.

name: Forester
flavor: The wilderness reclaimed Earth after the Collapse. Now Hunters reclaim the wilderness.

name: Ghost Angel
flavor: As we climbed the tern cliffs he moved their nests aside, real gently. At the top he strangled the Fallen sentry. Same hands."

name: Gravebreaker
flavor: Careful around the upholstery.

name: Grips of No Tomorrow
flavor: Accept war as a fundamental process, not a transient condition.

name: H_LD Starwinder
flavor: The trigger action is the central action, and so it must feel euphoric.

name: Harrowed Darkhollow Grasps
flavor: "All the vastness of our universe is but a blank page on which they scrawl their words of hate and death." —Eris Morn

name: Heliopause Grips
flavor: "We are not fatalists. We're optimists. We believe life exists beyond this dead orbit." —Arach Linde

name: Immanent War Grips
flavor: Tomorrow will not be easily tamed.

name: Infinite Lines Grips
flavor: "I saw three queens. No, two. No...just one." —RECORD 351-CHASM-6915

name: Iron Breed Sleeves
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Iron Camelot Grips
flavor: Forged in remembrance of Perun, she who hunted the Darkness where it dwelt.

name: Iron Companion Sleeves
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Iron Regalia Sleeves
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Jackknife
flavor: Micro-collectors absorb ambient moisture.

name: Justicar's Grips
flavor: A finger can be broken. A fist cannot.

name: KALI-GNT Scout Rig
flavor: I am a KALI-GNT AGGRESSIVE HANDSHAKE. Pleased to meet you.

name: Kallipolis Grips
flavor: We cannot win the war beyond our walls without first winning the people within them.

name: Kellhunter's Rally
flavor: The Kell's first command is a word. If the word goes unheeded, the Kell's second command is the blade.

name: Khepri's Sting
flavor: The wound is not deep, but you know it exists—and that is enough.

name: Komarov
flavor: The gauntlets include extensible microtools for fine work on spacecraft systems.

name: Long Tomorrow 9G
flavor: "All the way to Venus I tracked her. But in the jungles of the Ishtar Sink the trail vanished."

name: Mangala Skin
flavor: Mars is far, far out. Light crawls across the gap from the City. Hunters respect that isolation.

name: Neuroghast
flavor: Though compatible with organic humanoids, Neuroghast armor was optimized for prosthetic or Exo limbs.

name: Order's Grip
flavor: A finger can be broken. A fist cannot.

name: Prime Zealot Gloves
flavor: Forged from the remnants of broken Vex. Some of the component matter is older than the solar system.

name: Prototype
flavor: Your Ghost built this wire armor from available mass. It handles life support, but little else.

name: Queen's Guard Grips
flavor: The hand of the throne.

name: Raku Vindicator
flavor: Leather flash conceals an exquisite self-aligning coil pattern.

name: Rogue
flavor: A pauldron-mounted transceiver helps Hunters and their Ghosts stay in touch with their ships.

name: Rustburner
flavor: The gauntlets include a dedicated proprioceptor net for knife work.

name: Sanction Custom
flavor: In combat, every motion must be mindless and perfect.

name: Sanction Six
flavor: Some Hunters boast of things they find. We boast of places we fly.

name: Sealed Ahamkara's Grasps
flavor: Plating the Ahamkara bones in silver helps to quiet the auditory hallucinations...oh bearer mine.

name: Shinobu's Vow
flavor: "No supplies. Armor in tatters. But the refugees had asked for help. And she had given her word." —Tale of the Six Coyotes

name: Sinaa Jaguar
flavor: The wire in these gloves has been tweaked to grow warm when your knife pierces enemy hide.

name: Sinaa Lamprey
flavor: Slippery as an eel.

name: Sleeves of the Iron Lords
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Sleeves of the Pariah
flavor: "They cast him out. But his words never left." —Fractal Scrolls

name: Snakeline
flavor: "The black gloves are tough, menacing and—I swear—make you unbeatable at Go." —Pahanin Errata

name: Sojourn Grips
flavor: We must make our own safety without the City.

name: Spektar (All Types)
flavor: Armor infused with Chroma multi-channel heat sinks.

name: Stratus
flavor: A Hunter's armor must be nimble, tough, and wearable - because it will be their only home.

name: Takanome Ranger
flavor: "In the Dark Age, before the safety of the City, before the rise of the Tower, there were only the Rangers." —Chiyoko Mey

name: Tracker
flavor: Wire armor is light and flexible, perfect for silent motion and cramped conditions.

name: Vaquero
flavor: Howdy.

name: Vermilion Stripe
flavor: The vermilion stripe is a Hunter mark of mourning.

name: Warden's Rally
flavor: "That Prison holds nothing that does not want to be there. Knowing that, ask yourself, 'Why do the Taken stay?'" —Eris Morn

name: Watchers' Grips
flavor: "The watcher does not just observe. The watcher defines the observed." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Winged Sun Sleeves
flavor: "Those who fly beneath the Sun do not come back unscathed." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Wolf Pelt Weave
flavor: "In the Reef, you use what you can find, even if all you can find is Fallen."

name: Young Ahamkara's Spine
flavor: Give me your arm, oh bearer mine. Let me help you fill the world with teeth.

name: Raku Poltergeist 2.0
flavor: Crucible variant. Interlaced with Jormungand coil favored by Warlocks.

name: KD Bogatyr 2.0
flavor: "Just come back with a good story, y'hear?" —Cayde-6

name: High Command Grips
flavor: Your deeds speak for themselves.

name: Eon Tracer Gloves
flavor: "I can never find the beginning, the place where the path forks." —RECORD 448-CHASM-6808

name: Endling Grasps
flavor: We cannot let the lineage end with us.

name: Nanomania Grasps
flavor: Let's get right to it. How can Clovis Bray help the Exodus project? ~SIVA.MEM.CL001

name: Mongrel Ogre's Grasps
flavor: "Enemy of my enemy, I guess. Still, never thought we'd find ourselves here." —Shiro-4

name: Lion's Vigil Grips
flavor: "Step forward, if you think you can challenge me." —Fractal Scrolls

name: Iron Saga Grips
flavor: Thus armed were the Iron Lords of old, in the days after the Collapse.

name: Dream-Eater Grasps
flavor: Hunters suffer insomnia at far higher rates than other Guardians—even Exos.

name: Days of Iron Grips
flavor: "When the tainted grail o'erflowed again, who answered?" —The New-Forged Song

name: Shinobu's Vow
flavor: "No supplies. Armor in tatters. But the refugees had asked for help. And she had given her word." —Tale of the Six Coyotes

name: Grasps of Triumph
flavor: The glory you've fought for rests in your hands.
